content: noontide design 17th august 2013 poppy a simple poppy modelled on the paper poppies sold by the british legion for remembrance every year a scrap of red yarn a leftover button and you are done hook and extras 4 00m hook and a black button to fix attach a safety pin or brooch back yarn anything you like here i used some dk weight red acrylic abbreviations american british equivalent chain chain chain single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet treble_crochet double treble_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch slip_stitch pattern work in the round 1 ch5 and slip_stitch to first chain to make a loop ch1 a alternatively you can use a magic loop here if you prefer 2 10sc into ring 3 2sc into each stitch 4 ch3 2tr next stitch 1 treble_crochet next st three times 2tr into next st 3ch slip_stitch into next st 5 ch2 double_crochet same st 1tr next st 2tr next st five times double_crochet next st ch2 slip_stitch same st 6 fasten_off and weave in ends 7 stitch on black button in the centre noontide design 17th august 2013 finally please post a picture and comments if you can on your ravelry page i d love to know how you get on make give wear and enjoy
